data_type: Synthetic dataset based on World Bank indicator patterns
purpose: Portfolio project - Urban Mobility Optimization Analysis
data_source_methodology: Generated using realistic parameter ranges and correlations from actual World Bank data

data_patterns.realistic_correlations: GDP correlates with infrastructure and emissions
data_patterns.growth_trends: Economic growth, urbanization increase over time
data_patterns.missing_data: Realistic patterns - LPI biennial, infrastructure gaps for low-income
